Class Downloader

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Downloader
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDownloader, Serializable, Runnable, Remote
public class Downloader extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IDownloader, Runnable
The Downloader class implements the IDownloader interface and is responsible for downloading web pages, extracting information such as title, citation, links, and keywords, and then broadcasting this information via multicast to the barrels. It operates as a downloaders manager that creates threads to download web pages concurrently. The Downloaders Manager has a queue of URLs shared by all threads.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Downloader

      Downloader() throws RemoteException
      Constructs a Downloader object with the given multicast address and port. Connects to the Gateway and creates threads to download web pages concurrently.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related exception occurs.

  • Method Details

    • connectToGateway

      private void connectToGateway()
      Connects to the Gateway using RMI.

      private void createDownloaderThreads()
      Creates and starts downloader threads.

    • restoreQueueFromFile

      private void restoreQueueFromFile()
      Restores the queue from file if it exists.

    • run

      public void run()
      Executes the downloader thread's main task. Downloads web pages concurrently and extracts information such as title, citation, links, and keywords. Broadcasts this information via multicast to the barrels.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • download

      public void download(String url) throws RemoteException
      Adds a URL to the download queue.
      Specified by:
      download in interface IDownloader
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to download.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related exception occurs.

    • send

      public void send(String s) throws RemoteException
      Receives a message from the Gateway. If the message is a shutdown signal, shuts down the Downloader.
      Specified by:
      send in interface IDownloader
      Parameters:
      s - The message received.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related exception occurs.

    • extract

      private void extract(String url)
      Extracts information such as title, citation, links, and keywords from the given URL.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to extract information from.

    • loadStopWords

      private void loadStopWords(String filename)
      Loads stop words from the specified file.
      Parameters:
      filename - The path to the file containing stop words.

    • isStopWord

      private boolean isStopWord(String word)
      Checks if a word is a stop word.
      Parameters:
      word - The word to check.
      Returns:
      True if the word is a stop word, otherwise false.

    • normalizeWord

      private String normalizeWord(String word)
      Normalizes a word by removing accents.
      Parameters:
      word - The word to normalize.
      Returns:
      The normalized word.

    • loadConfig

      private void loadConfig()
      Loads configuration settings from the properties file.

    • shutdown

      private void shutdown()
      Shuts down the downloader, releases resources, and notifies the Gateway. Saves the queue contents to a file in case of a crash. The Downloaders Manager can restore the queue from this file when it restarts. The Gateway deletes this file when it restarts.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method creates a Downloader object with the specified multicast address and port.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments.
